name: Fierce
description: An aggressive nature that boosts attack power.

name: Fireproof
description: Natural resistance to heat and flames.

name: Gentle
description: A calm disposition that improves magical defense.

name: Keen Eye
description: Sharp vision that improves accuracy in combat.

name: Lucky
description: Fortune seems to favor this monster.

name: Nimble
description: Quick and agile movements boost speed.

name: Quick Learner
description: Learns from battles faster than others.

name: Thick Skin
description: Tough hide that reduces physical damage.

name: Tough
description: A hardy constitution that boosts maximum health.

name: Waterproof
description: Natural ability to repel and resist water.

name: Iron Will
description: An unbreakable spirit that greatly improves magical defense.

name: Elemental Affinity
description: A deep connection to elemental forces that boosts magical power.

name: Swift Strike
description: Lightning-fast reflexes that significantly boost speed.

name: Regenerator
description: Natural healing ability that helps recover in battle.

name: Hardy
description: Exceptionally tough body with greatly increased health.

name: Primal Power
description: An ancient force that dramatically boosts physical strength.

name: Mystic Aura
description: A mysterious energy that greatly enhances magical abilities.

name: Chaos Touched
description: Touched by chaos, granting unpredictable power boosts.
